medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started in the afternoon, located in the right lower quadrant, sharp and constant. No nausea or vomiting. Patient reports 2 episodes of large volume foul-smelling diarrhea similar to previous episodes of C. difficile colitis and has a fever with a temperature of 101. Symptoms have been ongoing since the onset.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV, asthma, IgA deficiency with history of multiple sinus/pulmonary infections, severe otitis media with mastoiditis, lipodystrophy, depression, C. difficile colitis, H. pylori gastritis, nephrolithiasis, cervical disc disease, Giardia, hypokalemia, degenerative joint disease of cervical spine.
medical_history.family_history: Prostate cancer in father and brother.
